ModMetaData.name: No Slave Romance (Re-Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Laurient
ModMetaData.description:
Mod from CactusPie: No Slave Romance - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2602481246 Updated for 1.5 ---
This mod prevents slaves from falling in love. Only prevents new romance from occurring, it will not affect any existing romances.
Mod settings allow you to enable or disable the following options: - Prevent slaves from romancing other slaves - Prevent slaves from romancing colonists
By default both settings are enabled, which means all romance for slaves will be disabled.
Required mod: Harmony.
GitHub Original: https://github.com/CactusPie/RimWorld-NoSlaveRomance GitHub Forked-Updated: https://github.com/pgailloud/RimWorld-NoSlaveRomance
